structured_content.summary:
# AI Tool Calls – Developer Cheatsheet (with Favorites)

A compact, copy‑pasteable reference for invoking tools via the XML‑like `<function_calls>` syntax … - For automations: keep **titles** short/imperative, **prompts** phrased as if user is speaking, and **schedules** in iCal VEVENT
action_items:
# AI Tool Calls – Developer Cheatsheet (with Favorites)

A compact, copy‑pasteable reference for invoking tools via the XML‑like `<function_calls>` syntax

create_textdoc</tool_name><parameters>{"name":"New Spec Draft","type":"document","content":"# Draft\n…"}</parameters></invoke></function_calls>
```

**Daily Reminder:**

```xml
<function_calls><invoke><tool_name>automations
create</tool_name><parameters>{"title":"Check Updates","prompt":"Search for system changes and notify me

run

Multi‑action web commands

create\_textdoc

New side‑panel doc

create_textdoc</tool_name><parameters>{"name":"Title","type":"document","content":"# Content"}</parameters></invoke></function_calls>
```

### canmore

create

Schedule tasks
